attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-0514

Date: 2005-04-05

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, pursuant to subsection 33(1) of the Nunavut Act, hereby appoints the following persons, each of whom is or has been a judge of a superior, county or district court of a province, to be deputy judges of the Nunavut Court of Justice who shall hold office during good behaviour until attaining the age of seventy-five years:

 

          (a)  the Honourable Myra B. Bielby

          (b)  the Honourable Kevin Coady

          (c)  the Honourable Sheila J. Greckol

          (d)  the Honourable David W. Gruchy

          (e)  the Honourable Patricia C. Hennessy

          (f)   the Honourable Cecilia I. Johnstone

          (g)  the Honourable Eric F. Macklin

          (h)  the Honourable Nathan Nurgitz

          (i)   the Honourable Gladys I. Pardu

          (j)   the Honourable Terrence A. Platana

          (k)  the Honourable John S. Poupore

          (l)   the Honourable Lynn D. Ratushny

          (m) the Honourable Gene A. Smith

          (n)  the Honourable Lawrie J. Smith

          (o)  the Honourable Colleen Suche

          (p)  the Honourable James D. Taylor


                 Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice et en vertu du paragraphe 33(1) de la Loi sur le Nunavut, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil nomme les personnes ci-après – chacune étant ou ayant été juge d’une cour supérieure, de comté ou de district d’une province – juges adjoints de la Cour de justice du Nunavut, à titre inamovible et jusqu’à ce qu’elles atteignent l’âge de soixante-quinze ans :

 

          a)  l’honorable Myra B. Bielby

          b)  l’honorable Kevin Coady

          c)  l’honorable Sheila J. Greckol

          d)  l’honorable David W. Gruchy

          e)  l’honorable Patricia C. Hennessy

          f)   l’honorable Cecilia I. Johnstone

          g)  l’honorable Eric F. Macklin

          h)  l’honorable Nathan Nurgitz

          i)   l’honorable Gladys I. Pardu

          j)   l’honorable Terrence A. Platana

          k)  l’honorable John S. Poupore

          l)   l’honorable Lynn D. Ratushny

          m) l’honorable Gene A. Smith

          n)  l’honorable Lawrie J. Smith

          o)  l’honorable Colleen Suche

          p)  l’honorable James D. Taylor
